casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. John H. Greer, Jr., Defendant-Appellant.(No. 72-351;Fifth DistrictApril 4, 1974.

EBERSPACHER, J., took no part.

PER CURIAM. Robert E. Farrell, Deputy Defender, of Mt. Vernon (Richard E. Cunningham, Assistant Appellate Defender, and Anthony J. Coultas, Senior Law Student, of counsel), for appellant. Michael J. Henshaw, State’s Attorney, of Harrisburg, for the People.
